feed.subtitle: An assortment of my ramblings and random adventures.

entry.title: An Optimistic Take: AI's Augmentation of Software Professionals
entry.summary: No doubt you've heard it before: "AI will make programmers obsolete" or "AI will take your job." But is this narrative accurate? News stories like Cognition AI's Devin, albeit found to be categorically a hoax, have nonetheless fueled fears among software professionals about the future of their careers. However, the most current look at the state of AI in software development suggests a more nuanced and hopeful future.
